venue.name: Little Ascutney State Wildlife Management Area

item.description: Little Ascutney Wildlife Area encompasses two peaks, a variety of terrain, and some views. From what I have gathered, the trails are not long but are steep. We'll follow the hike with lunch at Harpoon. To find it, you will turn onto Ascutney Basin Rd. (Weathersfield) if you are on 106 or Churchill Rd. (W. Windsor) if you are on 44. There is a side road with a lot on the east side of the road. Full information is in this PDF: http://bit.ly/yVjvAV...

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Little Ascutney with a Harpoon lunch afterward
